title: Insider Relationship Vocab
description: Vocabulary for the possible types of relationships between multiple insiders, or between insiders and external accomplices.

relationship.description: The insider's relationship to the other insider or accomplice at the time of the incident. If multiple, choose the strongest tie (e.g. "Friend" over "Colleague".

oneOf.title: Colleague

oneOf.title: Friend
oneOf.description: An ongoing close and/or friendly relationship.

oneOf.title: Significant Other/Legal partner
oneOf.description: Spouse, boyfriend, girlfriend, common law partner, or similar.
